page.title: 17TYPICAL HOLT FAMILY
page.content: MY FAMILY NAME:{ROBERT GRAHAM JAMES PAYNE ADDRESS:{BRIDGE STREET, {HOLT.NEAR WREXHAM. AGE:{10 SCHOOL:{HOLT COUNTY PRIMARY MY FAMILY CONSISTS OF MY MUM,MY DAD,MY SISTER AND I.MY MUM IS 38,MY DAD IS 41 ,MY SISTER IS 7 AND I AM 10 YEARS OLD. I HAVE THE INITIALS OF MY GRANDFATHER WHICH ARE R.G.J.P.THESE STAND FOR { {ROBERT GRAHAM JAMES PAYNE}.MY DAD WORKS FOR SHELL AT SLANLOW.HE IS A CHEMICAL ENGINEER. WE LIVE IN BRIDGE STREET.OUR HOUSE HAS TWO GARDENS AND A FIELD.OUR FRONT GARDEN IS VERY SMALL BUT OUR BACK GARDEN IS THREE QUARTERS OF AN ACRE.IN OUR BACK GARDEN WE GROW MANY CROPS e.g BLACKCURRANTS,POTATOES AND RUNNER BEANS.SOMETIMES MY GRANDMA COMES UP TO OUR HOUSE TO VISIT.SHE
